sqlMap.select: SELECT TABLE_NAME /*테이블 물리명 */ ,TABLE_COMMENTS /*테이블 논리명 */ ,COLUMN_NAME /*생성테이블:물리명 */ ,COMMENTS /*생성테이블:논리명 */ ,DATA_TYPE /*생성테이블:도메인 */ ,DATA_LENGTH1 /*생성테이블:자리수 1*/ ,DATA_LENGTH2 /*생성테이블:자리수 2*/ ,COLM_NAME /*메타용어: 물리명 */ ,ATTR_NAME /*메타용어: 논리명 */ ,REF1_FILD /*메타용어: 도메인 */ ,DOMN_LEN1 /*메타용어: 자리수1 */ ,DOMN_LEN2 /*메타용어: 자리수 2 */ FROM (SELECT A.TABLE_NAME ,E.COMMENTS AS TABLE_COMMENTS ,A.COLUMN_NAME ,B.COMMENTS ,A.DATA_TYPE ,DECODE(A.DATA_TYPE, 'VARCHAR2', A.DATA_LENGTH, 'CHAR', A.DATA_LENGTH, NVL(A.DATA_PRECISION, 0)) AS DATA_LENGTH1 ,DECODE(A.DATA_TYPE, 'VARCHAR2', 0, 'CHAR', 0, NVL(A.DATA_SCALE, 0)) AS DATA_LENGTH2 ,D.COLM_NAME ,D.ATTR_NAME ,D.REF1_FILD ,D.DOMN_LEN1 ,D.DOMN_LEN2 FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS A INNER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.COLUMN_NAME = B.COLUMN_NAME LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.COLM_NAME ,A.ATTR_NAME ,B.REF1_FILD ,NVL(A.DOMN_LEN1, 0) AS DOMN_LEN1 ,NVL(A.DOMN_LEN2, 0) AS DOMN_LEN2 FROM TM_METAXM A INNER JOIN TM_CODEXD B ON B.COMM_CODE = 'DOMN_CODE' AND A.DOMN_CODE = B.COMD_CODE) D ON A.COLUMN_NAME = D.COLM_NAME INNER JOIN USER_TAB_COMMENTS E ON A.TABLE_NAME = E.TABLE_NAME INNER JOIN USER_OBJECTS F ON A.TABLE_NAME = F.OBJECT_NAME WHERE E.TABLE_TYPE = 'TABLE' AND F.TEMPORARY = 'N') WHERE COLUMN_NAME != COLM_NAME OR COMMENTS != ATTR_NAME OR DATA_TYPE != REF1_FILD OR DATA_LENGTH1 != DOMN_LEN1 OR DATA_LENGTH2 != DOMN_LEN2 ORDER BY COLUMN_NAME
